name: Modern Combat Shooting
description:
Modern Combat Shooting is a battlefield war-fare game of 2018. In this FPS shooting game commando has to fight in battlefield with cruel terrorists. In this combat mission game you have to be careful as a army commando because terrorists are well trained and smart they can attack back on you. This 3d commando game contains multiple missions to enhance your commando shooter war tactics. You are highly trained commando shooter to complete all the war missions and to become a assassin killer to deadly war enemies. Shoot all your enemies with highly upgraded weapons and ammunition. For completing this mission you have to do counter strike against enemies then you can complete your mission and can win this gun shooting game. This gorgeous shooting game has realistic environment, amazing 3d graphics and mind blowing sound effects, you really love this game.
Download and beat your free time.
